modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds a buff to zombies, all 23 regular ones, that makes them angry. You won't like them when they're angry.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds a buff to zombies, all 23 regular ones, that makes them angry. You won’t like them when they’re angry.

Added a buff to all 23 regular zombies that make them run when 50% damaged.

Once the [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) gets below 50% damaged, a small particle effect will let you know it’s “enRaged”, and it will run rather than walk after you.

[**Download**](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Rage_Zombies)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/), Tin
